attributes.action: Increase public transport in rural/semi-urban areas + cut ticket cost.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The motorist is torn up by tax, only to be further ripped off if they change to public transport. More public transport services need to be introduced to semi-urban or rural areas where ticket prices for a 40 mile return journey are as much as £8 a day. Surely reducing ticket prices and increasing services is the BETTER solution to keeping traffic congestion down?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
